## utils.svgMath.wsToScreenCoordinates() function

Converts workspace coordinates to screen coordinates.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function wsToScreenCoordinates(ws: WorkspaceSvg, workspaceCoordinates: Coordinate): Coordinate;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  ws | [WorkspaceSvg](./blockly.workspacesvg_class.md) | The workspace to get the coordinates out of. |
|  workspaceCoordinates | [Coordinate](./blockly.utils_namespace.coordinate_class.md) | The workspace coordinates to be converted to screen coordinates. |

**Returns:**

[Coordinate](./blockly.utils_namespace.coordinate_class.md)

The screen coordinates.
